ComicInfo.Summary:
A special new printing of ENERGON UNIVERSE FCBD 2024 SPECIAL featuring three all new stories from the Energon Universe, with stunning revelations for the worlds of TRANSFORMERS, G.I. JOE, and VOID RIVALS from the biggest names in comics.
A perfect jumping-on point for new readers and a can’t-miss for long-term fans.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-26 01:42:11. [CVDB1054499]
ComicInfo.Writer: Daniel Warren Johnson, Joshua Williamson, Robert Kirkman
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jason Howard, Lorenzo De Felici , Ryan Ottley
ComicInfo.Inker: Jason Howard, Lorenzo De Felici , Ryan Ottley
ComicInfo.Colorist: Annalisa Leoni, Emilio Lopez, Matheus Lopes, Michael Spicer
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alessandro Micelli, Daniel Warren Johnson, Emilio Lopez, Gabriele Dell'Otto, Hector Trunnec, Ivan Tao, Joe Doyle, Khary Randolph, Lorenzo De Felici , Michael Spicer, Stephen Green, Tom Reilly
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Brawn, Cliffjumper, Clutch, Cover Girl, Destro, Duke, Flint, Golobulus, Hawk, Jazz, Lady Jaye, Megatron, Optimus Prime, Rock & Roll, Rodimus Prime, Scarlett, Slizardo, Stalker, Starscream, The Skuxxoid, Tomax, Wheeljack, Xamot
ComicInfo.Teams: Autobots, Cobra-La, Decepticons, G.I. Joe, M.A.R.S., Prime, Royal Guards, Seekers, Skuxxoids, United States Army
